named-query.name: MapAssociationEntity.findByMapId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapAssociationEntity a WHERE a.id.mapId = :mapId ORDER BY a.id.mapId, a.id.source, a.id.target

named-query.name: MapIconImageEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapIconImageEntity a ORDER BY a.filename

named-query.name: MapPositionEntity.findByMapId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapPositionEntity a WHERE a.id.mapId = :mapId ORDER BY a.id.mapId, a.id.elementId

named-query.name: MapBgImageEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapBgImageEntity a ORDER BY a.filename

named-query.name: MapAssociationEntity.findBySourceOrTarget
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapAssociationEntity a WHERE a.id.source in :source OR a.id.target in :target

named-query.name: MapPositionEntity.findByMapIdOrElementId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MapPositionEntity a WHERE a.id.mapId in :mapId OR a.id.elementId in :elementId
